snippet.title: Lake Ridden Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Lake Ridden is a story-driven, first-person mystery game, filled with puzzles. A thrilling supernatural adventure where you unravel a dark past, trying to save your sister. Luckily, you are not alone.

Release: Spring 2018. Wishlist and follow on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/696530/Lake_Ridden/

By Midnight Hub
